title: Chapter 760 - A Burst Of Energy
body:
Chapter 760 - A Burst Of Energy

Although he could sense the danger, Su Yi wasn’t at all concerned.

Rather, he’d already anticipated that the hostile factions would set something like this up, so it wasn’t at all surprising. 

Boom!

As he pondered, Su Yi struck once more. Streaks of sword qi surged into being, then swept outward, blanketing the world and descending upon Starpluck mountain like fierce gales and a sudden downpour.

Recently, his cultivation had increased to the peak of the early-stage Spiritual Incarnation Realm, and he’d already started comprehending the Void Cosmos and the Supreme Ultimate, the rare and supreme Mysterious Truths sealed within the Sword of the Nine Hells. 

It was no exaggeration to say that his abilities had grown to a whole new level since his tribulation, when he cut down twenty-five Spiritual Revolution cultivators.

Although he fought barehanded, the overflowing power of his sword qi could have easily cut through elite Spiritual Revolution cultivators like Huan Shanglin and Xie Zhibei!

Boom!

Heaven and earth trembled as sword qi swept forth like the tide.

When this slash descended, the nine formations blanketing Starpluck Mountain surged intensely, their rumbling reverberating throughout the nine heavens.

In the distant onlookers’...
